channel.title: +1 Forward - Firebrands Series - Thy Words Inspire, Thespians
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/summer-series-firebrands-thy-words-inspire-thespians
Rach and Rich continue their third Summer Series. This series covers games in the Firebrands style of PbtA games. This fourth episode of the series features Cole, creator of *​Thy Words Inspire, Thespians* .
Timecodes: 00:02:14- Setting Up 00:08:09 - The Challenge 00:15:22 - Playing the Games
You can find Cole's games here: https://magicole.itch.io/ They tweet here: https://twitter.com/TheMostMagiCole Cole's Twitch stream group can be found here: https://www.twitch.tv/rollplusbond
